name: Cuboton
description:
Story


In one of the Cuboton Research corporation laboratories, an incident occurs, after which everything around begins to mutate. An agent will be sent to the planet Cuboton with only one mission, to destroy this laboratory. Fighting with hordes of mutated creatures, we will have to make a journey to the heart of the laboratory and find out the true causes of the incident.

Key Features


  • 2D Pixel top down shooter
  • Special visual and musical atmosphere
  • Different types of enemies that require an individual approach
  • Battles with mutant bosses
  • Different types of weapons and approaches to their use
  • The game is a story part of subsequent games

Developers


The game, software, art and music part was created by one person - Rustam Shafigullin.
